text: The prime minister of Mauritius () is the head of government of Mauritius. ==List of officeholders== ;Political parties ===Chief Minister of Mauritius=== Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party Took office Left office Time in office British Mauritius 1 Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam 1959 26 September 1961 21 October 1963 PTR 1963 21 October 1963 12 March 1968 ===Prime Ministers of Mauritius=== Portrait Name Election Term of office Political party Alliance Took office Left office Time in office Mauritius (1968–1992) 1 Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam 1967 12 March 1968 23 December 1976 PTR Parti de L'indépendance (PTR–IFB–CAM) 1 Sir Seewoosagur Ramgoolam 1976 23 December 1976 30 June 1982 PTR PTR–CAM–PMSD 2 Sir Anerood Jugnauth 1982 30 June 1982 21 August 1983 MMM MMM–PSM Sir Anerood Jugnauth 1983 21 August 1983 30 August 1987 MSM MSM–PTR Sir Anerood Jugnauth 1987 30 August 1987 15 September 1991 MSM MSM–PTR Sir Anerood Jugnauth 1991 15 September 1991 Continued MSM MSM–MMM Republic of Mauritius (from 12 March 1992 onwards) Sir Anerood Jugnauth — Continued 20 December 1995 MSM MSM–MMM 3 Dr. Navin Ramgoolam 1995 15 December 1995 11 September 2000 PTR PTR–MMM Sir Anerood Jugnauth 2000 12 September 2000 30 September 2003 MSM MSM–MMM 4 Paul Bérenger — 30 September 2003 5 July 2005 MMM MSM–MMM Dr. Navin Ramgoolam 2005 5 July 2005 5 May 2010 PTR Alliance Sociale (PTR–PMXD–VF–MR–MMSM) Dr. Navin Ramgoolam 2010 5 May 2010 17 December 2014 PTR PTR–PMSD–MSM Sir Anerood Jugnauth 2014 17 December 2014 23 January 2017 MSM Alliance Lepep (MSM–PMSD–ML) 5 Pravind Jugnauth — 23 January 2017 7 November 2019 MSM MSM–ML 5 Pravind Jugnauth 2019 7 November 2019 13 November 2024 MSM Alliance Lepep MSM–ML-MAG-PM Dr. Navin Ramgoolam 2024 13 November 2024 Incumbent PTR Alliance du Changement (PTR-MMM-ND-REA) ==References==
title: Prime Minister of Mauritius
